title: AWESOME BRUSSELS SPROUTS
directions: Add brussels sprouts, black pepper, garlic salt & 1 tablespoon of olive oil to a skillet.
Cook over a low heat allowing the brussels sprouts to brown on each side before flipping them.
After about 10 minutes add 1 more tablespoon of olive oil & seasoned bread crumbs.
Cook for another 10 minutes, flipping occasionally.
